product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Savings Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.

product_summary.objective: Goal Assure IV is a ULIP savings plan designed to help policyholders achieve long-term life goals with market-linked investment options, loyalty additions, fund boosters, and life cover throughout the policy term.
key_highlights: Fund Booster at maturity (for policy term ≥ 10 years)
Return of Mortality Charges at maturity (ROMC)
Option to take death or maturity benefits in installments with Return Enhancer
Multiple fund choices including equity, debt and index funds
Top-up premium option for extra contributions
product_summary.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal allowed during the first 5 policy years.

core_benefits.details: Fund Value as on maturity date, provided the policy is in-force.
core_benefits.payout_type: Lump sum or Installments via Settlement Option

core_benefits.details: Higher of Prevailing Sum Assured or Regular Premium Fund Value, plus higher of Top-up Sum Assured or Top-up Fund Value.
All mortality charges deducted over policy term are added back at maturity, provided policy is in-force and premiums are fully paid.
2% of average daily regular premium fund values during last 3 years is added at maturity.
Added as % of average daily fund value over previous 3 years.
Extra loyalty benefit at maturity if family member is an existing Bajaj Life policyholder.

switching_rules.free_switches: Unlimited free switches allowed (Investor Selectable only)

charges_structure.mortality_charge: Deducted monthly via cancellation of units

riders.rider_name: Linked New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

compliance_rules.ulip_risk_warning: ULIPs are subject to capital market risks. Fund performance is not guaranteed.
compliance_rules.lock_in_period: 5 years mandatory lock-in as per IRDAI.
compliance_rules.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.
compliance_rules.suicide_exclusion: Within 12 months, nominee receives Fund Value as on date of death intimation.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: Beware of spurious calls. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to Income Tax Act provisions and amendments.

retrieval_chunks.text: Goal Assure IV provides Fund Booster (2%) at maturity and returns mortality charges deducted (ROMC), maximizing savings.
Loyalty additions are added at year 10 (1%), year 15 (1.5%), and year 20 (2%) based on average daily fund value.
Policyholders can choose from Investor Selectable, Wheel of Life, Trigger Based, or Auto Transfer strategies.
Entry age is 0–60 years, policy term options are 10/15/20 years, minimum premium starts at ₹36,000 yearly.
Premium allocation charge is nil. Policy administration charges apply up to 3% p.a., and FMC ranges up to 1.35%.
